entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
